Package org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

Class ColorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.ColorUtil
  • public final class ColorUtil
extends Object
    Utility to check alpha value.
    Internally is checking red, green, blue and alpha values and creates string representation of a color, to HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL or HSLA strings.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • toRGB

        static String toRGB​(IsColor color,
                    boolean withAlpha)
        Returns RGB or RGBA string value which represents the color.
        Parameters:
        color - color instance to use to get RGB string
        withAlpha - if true, creates a RGBA color instead of RGB
        Returns:
        RGB or RGBA string value which represents the color

      • checkChannelWithinBounds

        static void checkChannelWithinBounds​(int channel)
        Any integer between 0 and 255 (inclusive) is valid.
        Parameters:
        channel - channel to check, exception if the channel is nor within bounds

      • isAlphaWithinBounds

        public static boolean isAlphaWithinBounds​(double alpha)
        Returns true if any double is between 0.0d and 1.0d (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        alpha - alpha value, exception if the channel is nor within bounds
        Returns:
        true if any double is between 0.0d and 1.0d (inclusive)

      • createHSLAsString

        static String createHSLAsString​(int red,
                                int green,
                                int blue)
        Convert a RGB Color to it corresponding HSL values.
        See explanation Math behind color space conversions, RGB-HSL.
        Parameters:
        red - red value
        green - green value
        blue - blue value
        Returns:
        a string representation of HSL color, only h,s%,l%

      • toRGBs

        static double toRGBs​(double linear)
        Performs the conversion for the sRGB color space and converts it to a linear sRGB value.
        Parameters:
        linear - optical electronic color value
        Returns:
        linear sRGB value

      • fromRGBs

        static double fromRGBs​(double srgb)
        Performs the conversion for a linear sRGB value to a gamma-encoded sRGB value
        Parameters:
        srgb - electronic optical color value
        Returns:
        gamma-encoded sRGB value

      • pad

        static String pad​(String in)
        Applies the padding to a string to 2 chars.
        Parameters:
        in - string to be pad
        Returns:
        result string
